attributes.action: base road tax on annual milage, not CO2 output of the vechile
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i drive a mazda rx-8 which produces over 255g/km and i do annually approx 16,000km per year which means i produce just over 4 tones per year.  my friend drives a ford s-max and drives approx 60,000km per year and produces approx 190g/km and produces annually 11.5 tones per year.  i think if the government really wants to go green it should charge people for the pollution they make, not the pollution they can potentially make!
